sqlMap.select: select a.size_name, nvl(tb.price,0) as bid_price ,a.size_id from prod_size a, (select max(bid_price) as price ,c.size_ID as cid from bid b, PROD_SIZE c where b.BID_POSITION ='buyer' and b.SIZE_ID=c.SIZE_ID group by c.size_ID) tb where a.size_ID=tb.cid(+) and a.PROD_ID=#prod_id# order by 1

select a.size_name, nvl(tb.price,0) as bid_price ,a.size_id from prod_size a, (select min(bid_price) as price ,c.size_ID as cid from bid b, PROD_SIZE c where b.BID_POSITION ='seller' and b.SIZE_ID=c.SIZE_ID group by c.size_ID) tb where a.size_ID=tb.cid(+) and a.PROD_ID=#prod_id# order by 1
